caption:
Indians are just 1.5% of the US population, at almost 5.1 Mn people... but over 5% of the US taxes are paid by the Indian diaspora... punching far above their weight...

10% of all patents filed in the US have an Indian inventor...

10% of all doctors in the US are of Indian origin... which serve almost 30% of the US patients...

Over 11% of unicorns in the US have an Indian founder...

They own 60% of all hotels in the US... 

70% of the US colleges have an Indian in their top leadership...

78% of Indians in the US have a college degree, far above the national average of 36%... and 76% of these Indians work in positions of management, business, science or arts, not in blue collar work...

Over 80% of the past 30+ Spelling Bee competitions are won by kids from the Indian diaspora

Oh, and while Indian restaurants are just 1% of the total restaurants in the US, 3% of all Michelin starred restaurants are Indian... thus, they punch three times above their weight even in culture and food.

In 2023, these people donated USD 1.5 Bn worth to causes within the US... and almost USD 800 Mn of donations flow from these NRIs to India...

Indians today have so much soft power in the US, and the respect they have earned through generations of hard work is massive.

#casarthakahuja
